statdoc.items

Class StatdocItemHub

  • java.lang.Object
    • statdoc.items.StatdocItemHub

  • public class StatdocItemHub
extends java.lang.Object
    The Hub holds and creates all items and contains maintenance methods. Everything has to be Thread-safe in here (synchronize all data manipulations). This would be the DAO in a MVC pattern (eventually).
    Author:
    Markus Schaffner

        Main method to deal with a generalised command line/artefact. Should deal with matching up the found inputs/output to other items. And embed the CmdItem into the fabric of the project.
        Returns:
        a freshly created CmdItem

      • checkAndAddMetadata

        public boolean checkAndAddMetadata(Item item,
                          java.lang.String line)
        check a String if it contains information to be added to the Item and adds it to the Item if found TODO this should allow for matching and linking as well
        Parameters:
        item - the target item
        line - the line with potential information
        Returns:
        true if the line is metadata

      • groupMap

        public static java.util.Collection<Item> groupMap(java.util.Collection<Item> items,
                                  int number,
                                  int minlength,
                                  java.lang.String type)
        utility method to put a collection of items into a grouped Collection.
        Parameters:
        items - a collection of items
        number - the number of items needed to form a group
        minlength - the minimum length of teh string to group over (usually >=3)
        Returns:
        a collection with grouped items
